title: The Gormenghast Trilogy by Mervyn Peake
description:
This torrent contains the audiobooks of:
Book 1: Titus Groan 
Book 2: Gormenghast
Book 3: Titus Alone



"A doomed lord, an emergent hero and an array of bizarre creatures haunt the world of the Gormenghast novels which, along with Tolkien's Lord of the Rings, reign as undisputed fantasy classics of the highest order. At the center of everything is the 77th Earl, Titus Groan, who stands to inherit the miles of rambling stone & mortar that form Gormenghast Castle and it's kingdom.

"In these extraordinary novels, Peake has created a world where all is like a dream--lush, fantaastical, vivid; a symbol of dark struggle. Accompanying the text are his own drawings, illustrating the whole assembly of strange yet very real creatures that inhabit Gormenghast."




Enjoy!
-Ventricle
